tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Here I am writing a review as it‚Äôs almost been 9 months and I have seen the results! What do I say about doctor Gouri!!?? She is smart, knowledgeable, kind, understanding, modern and a pretty lady! I have found the best Gynaec for the rest of my life! I visited her the first time for my prolactin check in Feb 2023. She prescribed me one medicine for 3 months which was to be taken only at night and guess what it did wonders! My prolactin level came down to the right level within those 3 months! Backstory i was given the same medicine by the other doctor also, but just coz I was not told when and how to take the medicine it did not work! So here is the proof that doctor Gouri knows it all! Later I visited her the second time for my PCOD check and randomly told her about the acne issues I had been facing since my childhood and againnnn she gave me a course of one medicine, which I swear cleared the root cause of my acnes. I had acnes all over my face and would never go, they keep coming back one after the other but after the course given by doctor Gouri, by the end of third month I saw a drastic change and till now I have gotten no active acne on my face. Wait a second it was not just the medicine but I‚Äôd like to be really clear that I did follow some diet like cutting off dairy products, fried food and I completely went off sugar. Also as recommended by Doctor Gouri I started having fruits and dry fruits every morning without fail. I visited her the third time again for a problem and I think she has solutions to every problemmmm that I have had till now. You can be as open with her as you want she has no judgements and would give you nothing but the best solutionsss!!! The clinic also has a very smooth process and good vibes. So, don‚Äôt think twice before visiting her! She is the best Gynaec you‚Äôll find, trust me!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Gouri is extremely reliable and approachable as a person. She empathetically explains everything and helps you understand the root cause of the concerns and provides the right solutions. It has overall been a wonderful experience for me. She is also really sweet and warm and I would highly recommend her as your gynaecologist. The whole team at Dzire is also very responsive and prompt!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would like to express my sincere gratitude to Dr. Gouri Gupta. Her exceptional care and warm demeanor have consistently made my visits comfortable. During my recent follow-up session, she took the time to educate me about the importance of the HPV vaccine, the benefits of the HPV vaccine include reducing the risk of cervical cancer, protecting against several HPV-related cancers, and preventing certain types of HPV infections, showcasing her dedication to patient well-being beyond routine care. I appreciate the effort she puts into creating a positive and informative healthcare experience. Thank you, Dr. Gupta, for your outstanding service and commitment to your patients' health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Visited for 1st Pregnancy
So I got to know that I was pregnant last year in the midst of corona lockdown, my husband & me were both worried now - our 1st baby- whr should I be looking for a Obs/Gynec since I never visited one ever in my life (praise god) & then I searched on Practo someone close to my locality & found Dr. Gouri- a young beautiful woman with so many recommendations for IVF, Difficulty in getting pregnant & many other woman conditions. We thought to ourselves ours is a normal conception so should I even go to her? But then we just ended up going & the very first interaction just felt so wonderful and then we continued & went to her over and over for the rest 9 months üòÉ. This beautiful lady took utter care of me & my little pea inside throughout my pregnancy just like she would care for a woman with IVF or any other problems ü•∞. I had a wonderful smooth experience throughout my pregnancy & the warmth that you get from her is just next level üòç. Her staff are so friendly & well behaved & all sanitization practise was maintained. Her Clinic itself is really well maintained. I strongly strongly 1000% recommend Dr. Gouri to not only woman who have a normal conception but to even woman who have difficulty in getting pregnant as she has specialised in that & she can help you start a beautiful family üôÇ Kudos to your warmth, concern & love towards your patients Dr. GouriüôÇ I‚Äôve found a friend in you üôÇ

I never have visited a gynaecologist before, i was glad i chose her, she made me feel very comfortable and clarified all my doubts, 
If any one is looking for a gynaecologist, do meet her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor addresses the problem satisfactorily and is very cooperative. I would recommend Dr Gouri Gupta  for female and male infertility problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have married been 7years and visited many doctors to get pregnant. It was only after visiting Dr Gouri Sultane that my wife was diagnosed to be suffering from TB of uterus and Tubes her tubes were filled with water (Hydrosalpinx) . Dr Gouri removed those fluid filled tubes and then gave anti TB drugs for 9 months followed by IVF and we conceived in 1st attempt. We are very glad that our dream has come true and we will recommend Dr Gouri Sultane to anybody who is wanting to complete their family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr. Gouri for my menopause problem. During the course of treatment, she was able to identify other un-related health issues (pre-diabetes and Thyroid). After consulting with another Diabetes expert recommended by her, my blood sugar and Thyroid problems are under control.
I am very grateful to Dr. Gouri, for her correct assessment of my health problem, and her to-the-point treatment. I am more than happy to recommend her.
I would also like to thank Practo, for helping me connect with the right Doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
she has very unprofessional staff at her clinic.
they made me wait for 1 hour for video call consultation and that too without an update.
then she called me at her clinic and they made me wait again for more then a hour and that too unnessesarry.
her staff were too rude and they don't value your time at all.
when i asked her staff at the counter that how long it will take because i am not well at all thats why i have come for check up.
she didn't responded properly.
she did the blood test *** ********* *** *** ****** * ***** ******* she allready explained me what the issue is but still did it and they told me i will get the reports next morning in whatsapp.
and i have been cordinating with them since 2 days and i still didn't get the reports.

doctor is friendly and explained the issue really well.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** *** *********** ********** **** *** **** **** ******* ** ******** ****. I just wanted to send a huge thank you to Dr. Gauri Gupta and everyone working with her. I was feeling defeated for the past 6 years due to the infertility problem of my wife. She is a very genuine, trustworthy doctor. The best thing she gives proper guidance for the treatment. Everyone was so warm and compassionate, and Dr. Gauri Gupta really took the time to help us find the right plan for us. I truly believe that without y‚Äôall we would not have gotten pregnant. Thank you for helping make our dream a reality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When God decides to resolve your medical issue, he sends an angel called 'Doctor'! I consider it a divine intervention that I reached Dr. Gouri Gupta. With a history of two failed IUIs, thyroid issue and a low morale, I consulted Dr. Gouri. In the first meeting itself she gave me hope & an action plan to reach the goal.Since then we have successfully overcome all the obstacles and are racing towards success! Dr. Gouri is very approachable & also understands the physical,mental, medical & financial ramifications concerning IVF & does all she can to make it reasonable for the patients.For anyone planning to seek help for pregnancy, I will highly recommend Dr. Gouri Gupta.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My experience with Dr. Gauri and her staff has been phenomenal. I went to her after 2 failed IUIs. She listened to my problem patiently and explained the options I had. she suggested I undergo an HSG test to get my tubes checked and then go for a third round of IUI which worked for me. The way she carried out the IUI procedure was also commendable, everything was monitored and done on time. Very few doctors dedicate so much time to a patient.I was suffering from PCOS and undergoing fertility treatments for 2.5 years. Dr. Gauri made it possible within 2 months. For anyone going through similar situations, I would highly recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a good experience. We know Dr Gauri from last five to 6 years . It was good experience as we got the positive result for IVF in first attempt only . The way Dr Gauri taken up our case  it was more Like she is taking this as her family case and supported us mentally aswell . Thank Dr for making our Dream come true
